SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

HOSTNAME.description: Host to link to in password reset or confirmation emails.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Access key ID for AWS (or 3rd party) access key ID for S3 file storage.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Secret access key for AWS (or 3rd party) secret access key for S3 file storage.

S3_BUCKET_NAME.description: S3 bucket name for file storage.

AWS_REGION.description: AWS Region that S3 bucket is located in, if you are using AWS. If using S3_ENDPOINT, this value is not used, so you may set it to whatever you want.

S3_ENDPOINT.description: Endpoint of 3rd party service providing an S3-compatible API. Either AWS_REGION or S3_ENDPOINT must be specified.
